name: YumBit
description: YumBit is a modern food delivery web app where users can browse restaurants, order meals, and track delivery status in real time.
challenges: Fetching APIs, added review functionality in My Review page, and updated reviews in a modal.

name: Think Green
description: Think Green is an eco-awareness platform designed to promote sustainable living by sharing green tips, eco-projects, and community events.
challenges: Implementing community post moderation and optimizing API performance for large datasets.

name: SoulKnot
description: SoulKnot is a matrimony platform that connects individuals seeking life partners. Users can create profiles, browse matches, and communicate securely.
challenges: Implementing secure user authentication, matching algorithm, efficient profile search, and Admin Dashboard.
